pageContext.claim: “So since I [the steel and aluminum tariffs] announced this we've had numerous openings of plants and you have some that are going to open up or expand right here, and we've had a lot of, I mean, people are [unintelligible] to see a little bit differently.”
pageContext.analysis: U.S. Steel did announce that it would hire 500 workers. But economists said that overall, Trump's tariffs could cost 100,000 to 150,000 jobs in other industries because of the tariffs.
